name: Connect to the stars!
description:
Explore the vast universe and attempt to reach the Dyson sphere to connect your home planet to the power grid.

Scavenge the vast space for food, fuel, scrap, and ore what you use to ensure your survival and reach the final goal.

(P.S If you go to mine on a meteorite the controls are A and D for movement and Space for gathering/drilling)

(P.S2 Please ignore the fact that i somehow broke the logic that stops you from going into negative resources under certain cases.)
